name: S. Borrelli
review: They seemed to have the part I needed. I knew nothing about this online vendor so I cautiously ordered the part using PayPal. I waited two weeks and didn't see the part. I thought it might be a scam until I realized I never pressed 'ORDER'. Duh! Once I did, the part came in a few days.

name: Krista Kitty
review: It was a simple process in which I was able to purchase it through linking to my Google, Facebook account, or create an account. I entered my vehicle information into their site to ensure I got the right part.

name: Garcia
review: I had an issue with some items I ordered and needed to contact the company. Looking for an email address on their website I saw I could use the 'chat' feature to contact them.

name: Joseph Pitt
review: They had what I thought I needed, but after checking I didn't need the whole thing. I cancelled 1 of the 2 items on the order 3 hours after placing it.

name: Grossman
review: Never a issue with parts being damaged. I had a fitment issue with a part but managed to make it work with a bit glue to attach. The mold on the part was incorrect.

name: Kallie G
review: The part was delivered late. When I did a trial fit (you guessed it), wrong part, 24 hours before the paint appointment. How they could mess up something this SIMPLE is beyond me.
